content:
Hi everyone! Welcome to our new channel for making friendly phone calls! We'll use this space to coordinate getting lists for:

** Volunteer Recruitment Calls **- asking supporters to volunteer for Kamala 
** Confirm Calls** - making sure that people who are signed up for events & volunteering shifts have all the information they need 
** Rally Invite Calls** - inviting people to see Kamala or Tim (or other special guests) at campaign events 

We will have volunteer calls open all day starting tomorrow, though there may be times where most of our volunteers are calling voters in battleground states, and therefore these calls will run slower. 

In the meantime, we'd love for folks to get familiar with our dialer tool! You can sign up for a phonebank training here: https://events.democrats.org/event/664004/

And then check out some of our resources here: 
* **How to Use the Dialer:** https://go.kamalaharris.com/resources/dialer/
* **Phonebank Volunteer FAQ: **https://go.kamalaharris.com/resources/pbvolunteerfaq/
* **Dialer Training Video: **https://go.kamalaharris.com/resources/dialervideo/

Thank you for being on this team!
hi <@1075943390232989706> - sorry this message got missed. How can I help you?
All good! For the phone banks is there a specific set schedule or are they accessible at anytime?
We have anytime dialing from 9am EST until 11:30pm EST (we are calling the west coast at that time)
So we just, what, say that we want to make calls in here and y‚Äôall post a link to the dialer? I‚Äôm confused
Also on my phone dialer autocorrects to diaper, fyi ü§£
So if I ever ask for the diaper, that‚Äôs what‚Äôs happening
HEYYYYYY best friend  <@1266394779676184707> - and YES! You just tag a <@&1242252399284977714> and whoever is on shift will be able to hook you up!
Excellent! There are times I could use some easy calls
I am phonebanking in NV and getting multiple people telling me they have been called 2-3 x today. How can we stop this?

Matt, I understand the frustration.  The issue is that this is such an important election, NV is an important state, and there are multiple organizations making calls.  The person can ask to be removed from the list, but that is just OUR list.  Others will still call.  I have had some success explaining all of this to people, and those that support Kamala Harris generally will be nice, at least.  All we can do is stay positive, polite, and sympathetic.  (on a side note...I now answer almost every call I receive, even the ones marked 'spam', because it might be a volunteer looking for that positive reinforcement to keep making calls. üòç )
I also remind people to vote as soon as possible. Usually campaigns get updates on who has already voted and remove those people from their call lists.

My daughter and I are going to vote in the next couple of days, my husband likes to go on election day! Voting here has been open for a couple of weeks at the government center but now the local places including one right near us are open too!
Hi someone in GA wants to know if it's too late to request an absentee ballot?
No, not too late, they have untill 10/25 to request
